class.name: LibSM64MarioInputs
class.brief_description: Class representing the Nintendo 64 controller input.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the Nintendo 64 controller's A button is being pressed.
If [code]true[/code], the Nintendo 64 controller's B button is being pressed.
If [code]true[/code], the Nintendo 64 controller's Z button is being pressed.

Camera vector information for calculating the desired movement direction. [member Vector2.x] should the [code]x[/code] coordinate of the 3D vector representing the direction the game camera is facing. [member Vector2.y] should the [code]z[/code] coordinate of the 3D vector representing the direction the game camera is facing. [b]Note:[/b] the 3D vector of the facing direction of a [Camera3D] node is [member Camera3D.global_transform.basis.z].
Input vector of the Nintendo 64 controller's joystick. [member Vector2.x] should be in the range [-1, 1]. [member Vector2.y] should be in the range [-1, 1].
